item.title: 根据一份新的联邦报告，2023 年仍有 MIS-C 病例发生，而未接种疫苗或接种疫苗后免疫力下降的儿童患这种疾病的风险最高。
item.description:
Cases of MIS-C are still occurring in 2023 and children who are unvaccinated or have waning immunity from previous vaccination are at the highest risk of developing the condition, according to a new federal report. https://t.co/VJ3k6LbEVC

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 人们蜂拥到乔氏超市购买这种病毒式传播的商品，不，这不是食品。
item.description:
People are flocking to Trader Joe's to pick up this viral item and, no, it's not food. https://t.co/8uhRhx0dV8

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 艾伦研究所的研究人员正在开展 "登月 "项目，比如绘制人脑地图，希望借此了解人体器官，帮助防治脑部疾病。
item.description:
Researchers at the Allen Institute are pursing "moonshot" projects, like mapping the human brain, in hopes of understanding the organ and to help fight brain diseases. https://t.co/TUMEu2KgUd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 选取彩票号码的策略充满了迷信色彩，从幸运号码到多年保持同样的选号方法，不一而足。一位母亲利用孩子的生日选号成功，帮助她赢得了 140 万美元。
item.description:
The strategy for picking lottery numbers can run the gamut of superstition, ranging from lucky numbers to keeping the same picks for years.
One mom found success using her child's birthdate, helping her win $1.4 million. https://t.co/uAesvS6vGq

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 冰岛西南海岸的一座火山周六爆发，这是自12月以来的第四次火山爆发，导致渔业小镇格林达维克（Grindavik）的居民撤离：
item.description:
A volcano on Iceland's southwestern coast erupted on Saturday for the fourth time since December, prompting an evacuation for the fishing town of Grindavik, officials say.

Read more: https://t.co/tq2uQ4ksPs pic.twitter.com/yOvU19l4Qb

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 在奈克斯-本尼迪克特去世后，@ABC 新闻采访了他以前的学生和当地的家长，他们表示，反 LGBTQ 政策和言论的影响在俄克拉荷马州的学校中日益受到关注，比如本尼迪克特曾经就读的奥瓦索高中（Owasso High School）。
item.description:
After Nex Benedict's death, @ABC News spoke with former students and local parents, who say that the impact of anti-LGBTQ policy and rhetoric is a growing concern in Oklahoma schools like Owasso High School, where Benedict was a student. https://t.co/QehAMA8vgj

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 最新消息华盛顿特区发生枪击案，造成至少两人死亡、五人受伤，警方表示正在搜捕一名嫌疑人。
item.description:
JUST IN: At least two people killed and five others injured in a shooting in Washington D.C. as police say they are searching for a suspect. https://t.co/2u2plcVgMm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 拜登-哈里斯竞选团队表示，他们在 2 月份筹集到了 5300 多万美元，这是自 2023 年 4 月启动竞选活动以来募集资金最多的一个月：
item.description:
The Biden-Harris campaign says it raised more than $53 million in February — marking its strong month since launching in April 2023.

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 乌克兰发动了新一轮大规模无人机袭击，因为俄罗斯人在总统投票的最后一天进行了投票，普京总统的统治将延长六年。
item.description:
Ukraine has launched a new massive wave of drone attacks as Russians cast ballots on the final day of a presidential vote set to extend President Vladimir Putin’s rule for another six years. https://t.co/LdgWsMXGbC

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 警方称，华盛顿特区发生一起枪击案，嫌犯徒步逃逸，警方正在搜捕嫌犯。
item.description:

item.title: 在气候变化、人口增长和耐药性的驱动下，真菌感染的危险性正在不断增加，美国疾病预防控制中心和世界卫生组织发出的新警告更是强化了这一点。
item.description:
Driven by climate change, population growth, and drug resistance, the danger of fungal infections is growing, reinforced by new warnings from the CDC and WHO. https://t.co/YxEC3U0Oeq

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 众议员劳伦-博伯特（Lauren Boebert）在争取继续担任国会议员的过程中走着最狭窄的钢丝绳，但她的竞选团队警告说，现在还不能将她排除在外。
item.description:
Rep. Lauren Boebert is walking the narrowest of tightropes as she campaigns to remain in Congress — but operatives warn against writing her off just yet. https://t.co/Gzg8obHuf2

item.title: 拜登总统在周六于华盛顿举行的年度 "铁人俱乐部 "晚宴上讽刺了前总统特朗普，最后严肃地谈到了民主问题。

item.title: 据他的业务经理证实，他是一位登山家、作家和电影制片人，曾在 1998 年联合执导和制作了一部关于攀登珠穆朗玛峰的 IMAX 纪录片。享年 68 岁。
item.description:

item.title: 公牛鲨是世界上最具攻击性的鲨鱼物种之一，其数量在 20 年间大幅增加，研究人员称，海水变暖是罪魁祸首。
item.description:
The number of bull sharks — one of the most aggressive species of shark in the world — increased significantly in a 20-year period, and researchers say warmer seawater is to blame. https://t.co/8VKAipveQ0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 冰岛西南海岸的一座火山周六喷发，这是 12 月以来的第四次火山喷发，引发了人员疏散。

item.title: 罗德岛州州长丹-麦基（Dan McKee）表示，罗德岛的一座重要桥梁因安全问题于 12 月部分关闭，将需要拆除并更换。
item.description:

item.title: Dollar Tree 计划在 2024 财年上半年关闭 600 家 Family Dollar 门店。在接下来的几年里，该公司打算再关闭 370 家 Family Dollar 门店和 30 家 Dollar Tree 门店。
item.description:
Dollar Tree plans to shutter 600 Family Dollar stores in the first half of fiscal 2024. Over the next several years, the company intends to close 370 more Family Dollar locations, as well as 30 Dollar Tree stores. https://t.co/SWOlqdeLbE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 旨在确保以色列-哈马斯战争停火的谈判陷入僵局，预计最快将于周日在卡塔尔正式恢复。
item.description:
Stalled talks aimed at securing a cease-fire in the Israel-Hamas war are expected to resume in earnest in Qatar as soon as Sunday. https://t.co/4uDm3GSeLt

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 随着全国麻疹病例的增加，芝加哥已成为美国最新的疫情中心城市。

item.title: 一个强大的房地产贸易集团已同意取消数十年来帮助确定经纪人佣金的政策，以解决声称这些规则迫使人们支付人为抬高的卖房成本的诉讼。
item.description:
A powerful real estate trade group has agreed to do away with policies that for decades helped set agent commissions, moving to resolve lawsuits that claim the rules have forced people to pay artificially inflated costs to sell their homes. https://t.co/Auz7lOinOZ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 一项新的分析显示，美国一些州向当地水道排放的工业活动产生的化学废物要比其他州多得多。
item.description:
Some U.S. states are discharging much more chemical waste from industrial activity into local waterways than others, according to a new analysis. https://t.co/OMGuALIoRc

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 美国移民和海关执法局的律师告诉 @ABC 新闻，因一名佛罗里达州警官死亡而被捕的危地马拉移民 Virgilio Aguilar Mendez 已被释放。
item.description:
Virgilio Aguilar Mendez, the teen migrant from Guatemala who was arrested following the death of a Florida police officer, has been freed from U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement's custody his lawyers told @ABC News. https://t.co/Kw7Ns7brtX

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024
